public_knowledge.context: This document summarizes publicly known tax legislation and policy developments from 2013 that were widely covered in financial and political media

analysis.summary: This Deutsche Bank tax newsletter provides a comprehensive analysis of year-end 2013 tax developments, including the budget deal, tax extenders legislation, the Affordable Care Act tax provisions, estate tax changes, and political implications for tax reform in 2014.
